What to bring/install for the hackathon

= What to bring/have prepared =
  * Laptop
  * Any demos using our APIs
  * [http://gears.google.com/ Google Gears]
  * [https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/1843 Firebug] for debugging JavaScript
  * Subversion utility -- to use code.google.com hosting for JavaScript (note: server-side scripts won't run)
  * If you don't plan on using code.google.com to host code, have your own host prepared
